title: Adaptive Hypermedia Design: Pattern-Based Project Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming knowledge and comprehension of hypermedia concepts
context.additional_context: Development of an adaptive hypermedia system applicable to language education domains requiring learner-tailored content design

learning_goals: Learners can establish an adaptive hypermedia design process by analyzing concept maps and constraints according to the APHID methodology.
Learners can apply instructional patterns (directive/constructive) and representation patterns tailored to various learner types.
Learners can implement small-scale hypermedia applications using a semi-automated prototyping tool operable in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
